articles.author: Tara Suter
articles.title: Most say they probably won’t get updated COVID vaccine: Survey - The Hill
articles.description: Most Americans in a new poll said they probably won’t get an updated COVID-19 vaccine. The Pew Research Center survey found 60 percent said they are “probably not” going to “get an updated vaccine.” Just less than 25 percent said they “probably” will get a bo…
